definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
variant of 叫花子[jiao4 hua1 zi5]

sentences.english: The tops of the beggar's shoes had worn so thin that his toes were poking through.
sentences.chinese: 叫化子的鞋幫磨得很薄，腳趾頭快要出來了。

sentences.english: If the worst comes to the worst, use the portable annihilator in your helmet.
sentences.chinese: 如果最壞的最壞的情況下，使用便攜式零化子您頭盔。

sentences.english: The influence of electron spin on the properties of the strong coupling surf ace magnetopolaron was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了電子自旋對強耦合表面磁極化子性質的影響。

sentences.english: Finite groups with given indices of normalizers of primary subgroups are studied .
sentences.chinese: 研究了已給準素子羣的正規化子指數的有限羣。

sentences.english: I'm not asking any girl to marry a pauper.
sentences.chinese: 我是說我不會要求任何姑娘給一個叫化子。

sentences.english: If the superintendents had caught sight of them, they would have driven such rags forth.
sentences.chinese: 如果看門人發現了他們，一定要攆走這些小化子。

sentences.english: Fuck the panhandlers grubbing for money.
Fuck the panhandlers grubbing for money, smiling at me behind my back.
sentences.chinese: 操那些要錢的叫化子，在他媽背後笑話我。

sentences.english: This proves one half of the double centralizer properties. Another half was obtained by S.
sentences.chinese: 這證明了一半的雙重中心化子性質，另一半已由S。
四個叫化子，一隻小黃鶯。

sentences.english: Beggar that I am, I am even poor in thanks. (II. 2)
sentences.chinese: 我樣的叫化子，我的感謝也是不值錢的。

definition: variant of 叫花子[jiao4 hua1 zi5]
armed escort (of travelers or merchants' caravans)
variant of 伙計|伙计[huo3 ji5]
(old) (in a tavern or inn etc) waiter/attendant
